name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bloomberg: Chinese companies and households increased their foreign currency deposits sharply in January, reflecting concerns about the depreciation of the renminbi, especially against the backdrop of Sino-US trade tensions. According to data from the People's Bank of China, foreign currency deposits in China increased by nearly $40 billion in January. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkKY4VPW8AEWWoH.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hong Kong media: Xi Jinping held a discussion with a number of private entrepreneurs on Monday. Yesterday, the Internet circulated the summaries of the speeches of six entrepreneurs at the meeting. Huawei founder Ren Zhengfei said in his speech on the spot that although China has made remarkable progress in the fields of intelligent driving and semiconductors, it still needs to be wary of "superficial prosperity covering up internal shortcomings."
 Ren Zhengfei said that the next five years will be a life-and-death window period for China's technology industry, and private enterprises must become the makers of global technology rules.
He also revealed that Huawei has launched "Backup Plan 2.0", joining forces with 2,000 Chinese companies to reconstruct the ecosystem in key areas such as semiconductors and industrial software, with the goal of achieving an autonomy rate of more than 70% for the entire industry chain by 2028.
 Wang Chuanfu, who was also present, believed that private enterprises should actively participate in global competition and expand international markets, and called on private enterprises to pay attention to the training and introduction of talents.

A man reported under his real name that a doctor at the Chifeng University Hospital asked a third-party salesperson to bring medical equipment directly to the hospital and sell it to patients by scanning payment. The doctor then implanted the unknown medical consumables into the patient's brain, causing the patient to lose hearing. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892257593437085696/pu/img/la-_rn82zx910fuP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump hit back at Zelensky’s comments, accusing him of being an unelected dictator and suggesting he was responsible for the Russo-Ukrainian war.
“Imagine that a barely successful comedian, Vladimir Zelensky, persuaded the United States to spend $350 billion on an unwinnable, completely avoidable war that he would never have ended without the United States and Trump.
The United States has already spent $200 billion more than Europe, whose funding is guaranteed and the United States gets nothing. Why doesn’t “Sleepy Biden” demand balance? After all, this war affects Europe far more than the United States — there is a vast, beautiful ocean between us.
On top of that, Zelensky admitted that half of the money we gave him “disappeared.” He refuses to hold elections, is extremely low in the polls in Ukraine, and the only thing he’s good at is…
fullContent:
特朗普回击泽连斯基的言论，指责泽连斯基是一个未经选举的独裁者，暗示他要为俄乌战争负责。
“想想看，一个勉强算成功的喜剧演员，弗拉基米尔·泽连斯基，竟然说服了美国花费 3500 亿美元，投入到一场根本赢不了、完全可以避免的战争。而这场战争，如果没有美国和“特朗普”，他永远无法结束。
 美国已经比欧洲多花了 2000 亿美元，而欧洲的资金是有保障的，而美国却什么都得不到。为什么“昏昏欲睡的拜登”不要求平衡呢？毕竟，这场战争对欧洲的影响远大于对美国——我们之间隔着广阔美丽的海洋。
 除此之外，泽连斯基承认，我们给他的资金有一半“失踪了”。他拒绝举行选举，在乌克兰的民调中支持率极低，而他唯一擅长的就是把拜登当成傀儡操控，这个没有经过选举的独裁者——泽连斯基最好快点行动，否则他的国家就要没了。
 与此同时，我们正在成功地与俄罗斯谈判结束战争的方案，所有人都承认，只有“特朗普”和特朗普政府才能做到。拜登从未尝试，欧洲也未能带来和平，而泽连斯基可能只是想让这列“送钱列车”继续运行。
 我爱乌克兰，但泽连斯基的表现糟糕透了，他的国家四分五裂，数百万无辜的人丧生——而这一切仍在继续……”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin said he learned on Wednesday afternoon local time that Russian armed forces soldiers had crossed the Russian-Ukrainian border in the Kursk region.
Putin said in an interview at a drone manufacturing plant in St. Petersburg that Russian soldiers from the 810th Brigade crossed the border in the Kursk region and entered Ukrainian territory, and the Russian army was advancing along the front line. He stressed that the Russian armed forces were launching an offensive along the entire contact line.
The Anti-False Information Center of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine denied Putin's statement, saying that the Russian sabotage and reconnaissance team attempted to enter Ukrainian territory and that the sabotage and reconnaissance team had been destroyed.
A spokesman for the General Staff of the Ukrainian Armed Forces also said that the situation claimed by the Russian side did not match the facts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The defendant sentenced to death in the case of a Japanese boy being attacked and killed in Shenzhen did not appeal. The court pointed out that the defendant Zhong Changchun purchased knives to commit crimes in order to gain online attention, which was a premeditated crime. He also took the initiative to contact the media after the incident. His behavior was extremely bad and the consequences were extremely serious. It did not mention whether the Japanese were targeted. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkOFKOXW4AAGSxy.jpg
